title: Manifest
description: Describes the packages which have been installed by Packman.

file_map.title: File Map
file_map.description: Files claimed by Packman packages; autogenerated from package file lists.

original_files.title: Original Files
original_files.description: Locations of files backed up during installation of a Packman package.

orphaned_files.title: Orphaned Files
orphaned_files.description: Locations of files which were previously claimed by Packman but which have been disowned due to checksum mismatch; autogenerated based on package checksums at manifest save time.

version.title: Version
version.description: Manifest version for future backwards compatibility.

ManifestPackage.title: ManifestPackage
ManifestPackage.description: Describes an installed package's files, checksums, files displaced during installation, etc.

version.title: Version
version.description: Name of the installed package version.

options.title: Options
options.description: List of specific packages installed for this version e.g. software often has separate builds for amd64, arm, x86.

files.title: Files
files.description: List of files claimed (either partially or wholly) by this package e.g. files that were created, modified or replaced during the installation of this version.

checksums.title: Checksums
checksums.description: Dictionary mapping files to their checksums for basic conflict detection and file validation.
